page.title: 09AMENITIES AND SERVICES.
page.content: Harby has two shops,one of which is the Post Office.Both sell general groceries,stationary,sweets,etc.There are also mobile shops which visit the area.These include butchers,bakers, fresh fish,green grocers,fish and chip van. There is a park in the village of Harby called the{Leas,}which is near to the{Village Institute.}On the Leas are swings,a cycle track,a slide and an adventure playground. Within the village is the primary school and church,both handsome ironstone buildings.There is also a Methodist chapel on Main Street. The nearest hospital with a casualty department is{The Queens,Nottingham.} There are doctors in two local villages, Cropwell Bishop and Long Clawson.The nearest emergency services are at{Bingham and Melton Mowbray,
